t: The Metal Ware Corporation - Company Profile and Products | Metoree
s: The Metal Ware Corporation (MWC) is a contract manufacturer specializing in metal and plastic fabrication services that was established in 1920 and merged with Chard International in 2016. Headquartered in Two Rivers, Wisconsin, the company offers metal stamping and coating, plastic injection, and rotational molding, as well as plastic extrusion services. They also produce appliances and kitchenware under the NESCO, Chard, and Carey brand ...
